price: (Allah) aravuga ati “Yewe Ibilisi! Kuki utubamye hamwe n’abubama?”
arabic: قَالَ يَٰٓإِبۡلِيسُ مَا لَكَ أَلَّا تَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qāla yāib'līsu mā laka allā takūna maʿa al-sājidīna
